img_text: ted 52%-ו2:44 #rules ー Aug 19, 2018 David (Admin) Aug 19,2018 7:50 PM Promoting in-game mod menus is against Discord's ToS and they shut down servers where it's promoted. Anyone that tries to sell promote or enquire about GTA online Menus and/or other game mods will have the message deleted, do it continuosly and you may be banned! This doesn't include story mode mods, online mods only! (Unless supported by the game developers) (edited) +Unauthorized to send messages
